entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: Danny Meyer is returning millions in government aid. Meanwhile, the White House and Congress plan to add $350 billion to the $349 billion small business rescue fund that's already evaporated. Who's minding the store in Washington? https://t.co/zldgm8oWjV
